Parameters: int: Absolute scroll position of the content inside the WearableListView.
onAbsoluteScrollChange(int).Description: BE ADVISED DO NOT USE THIS This might provide wrong values when contents of a RecyclerView change. Called when the content is scrolled, reporting the absolute scroll value.

Parameters: int: Position of the item in the Adapter.
onCentralPositionChanged(int).Description: Called when the central item of the WearableListView changes.

Parameters: int: The updated scroll state. One of @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#SCROLL_STATE_IDLE_E@, @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#SCROLL_STATE_DRAGGING_E@ or @B_android#support#v7#widget#RecyclerView#SCROLL_STATE_SETTLING_E@.
onScrollStateChanged(int).Description: Called when WearableListView's scroll state changes.

Parameters: int: Amount the content was scrolled. This is a delta from the previous position to the new position.
onScroll(int).Description: Called when the content is scrolled, reporting the relative scroll value.

ClassDesc: Interface for listening to WearableListView content scrolling.
